In order to remove this page completely (with its dependencies) from this template. You will have to remove templates/bulletin.html and templates/bulletin_entry.html. In app.js you can remove the relevant states and you also can remove angular-sanitize via bower uninstall --save angular-sanitize with its entry in index.html and app.js.
